00028 function AutoLaunch ( $str )
00029 // User's manual :
00030 //Launch Web generation at the end of the page load
00031 //If DEBUG_MODE is set to true, the content of
00032 //$str will be displayed
00033 //
00034 // Contract :
00035 //
00036 {
00037         if ( class_exists ( 'CurrentPage' ) && is_subclass_of ( CurrentPage, 'AbstractSingleton' ) )
00038         {
00039                 CurrentPage::GetInstance();
00040                 $str = '[DEBUG='.$str.']';
00041         }
00042         
00043         if ( ! DEBUG_MODE )
00044         {
00045                 $str = '';
00046         }
00047         
00048         return $str;
00049 }
